code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./adminaccess.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import SideMenu from'./SideMenu';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminLogin=_ref=>{let{closeModal}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://ec2-13-201-226-31.ap-south-1.compute.amazonaws.com/api/admin/login',{username,password});if(response.status===200){console.log('Login successful:',response.data);navigate('/admin-dashboard');}}catch(error){console.error('Login failed:',error.response?error.response.data:error.message);alert('Invalid username or password');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-modal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Admin Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bx bxs-user"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bx bxs-lock-alt"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",children:"Login"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SideMenu,{})]});};export default AdminLogin;
